revision.text:
{{Codepointer|r=Hexen}} '''A_CHolyCheckScream'''
(''no parameter'')
Calls [[A_CHolySeek]] and has a 5/64 chance of playing the sound "SpiritActive" on the Voice channel. If the calling actor does not have a tracer target it will search the blockmap for a nearby target. Should a target be aquired, the {{Flag|NOCLIP}} and {{Flag|SKULLFLY}} flags are set and the {{Flag|MISSILE}} flag is unset. This codepointer is restricted to {{Class|HolySpirit}} and derived classes.
